scene_end_anchor: Artie successfully kited a Level 4 Skeleton Archer in the Low-Level Crypts until it exhausted its quiver. He took zero damage by timing his movements to the archer's 120-BPM attack script using Pattern Recognition (Rank G). The encounter left Artie unharmed and validated his high-evasion strategy.
constraints: Artie is Level 2 with 1/1 HP, 100% Crit Rate, 50 Evasion, and 100% Aggro (Critical Density).
Artie possesses the Pattern Recognition (Rank G) skill.
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Participation Trophy (status=held, container=hand_left, soul-bound=TRUE)
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Cloak of the Cowardly Lion (status=equipped, container=back)
inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> Corporate ID Badge (status=equipped, container=neck)
Artie is under the 'Coward's Shame' and 'Coward's Sprint' statuses.
next_action: Artie discovers that his 100% Crit Rate triggers a 'System Overload' loot glitch.

chapter_so_far: Artie's attempt to fix his aggro problem backfired, making the Participation Trophy a permanent part of his build.
Artie successfully bypassed a high-level security lock using his crit glitch, revealing the gear he needs to survive.
Artie acquired the Cloak of the Cowardly Lion, gaining a massive evasion boost at the cost of his dignity.
Artie escaped the collapsing merchant shop and is now a fugitive in the backstreets of Oakhaven.
Artie has entered the Low-Level Crypts and discovered that his data-entry background allows him to predict enemy movement patterns.
Artie successfully kited a Skeleton Archer in the crypts, validating his high-evasion strategy and Pattern Recognition skill.
key_facts_ring: Barnaby's Bargains & Blunders collapsed, temporarily blocking the mob's pursuit.
Artie escaped into the backstreets of Oakhaven as a neon-yellow fugitive.
location: Oakhaven - Backstreets
Artie is under the 'Coward's Shame' and 'Coward's Sprint' statuses.

milestone: shop_escape_completed = DONE
Artie arrived at the Low-Level Crypts and triggered a 100% Aggro state due to his neon yellow cloak.
The Cloak of the Cowardly Lion's 'Coward's Shame' effect automated Artie's evasion against three Crypt Skirmishers.
Artie identified the skeletons' movement patterns as a 120-BPM combat script.
Artie gained the Pattern Recognition (Rank G) skill.
Artie successfully kited the skeletons using rhythmic timing, taking zero damage.
milestone: pattern_recognition_unlocked = DONE
Artie encountered a Level 4 Skeleton Archer in the Low-Level Crypts.
The Cloak of the Cowardly Lion triggered an Evasion Proc to avoid the first arrow.
Artie used Pattern Recognition (Rank G) to identify the archer's 120-BPM attack script.
Artie successfully dodged subsequent arrows by timing his movements to the 'upbeat'.
Artie's stamina decreased to 64/100 during the encounter.
The Skeleton Archer exhausted its quiver, rendering it unable to attack.
Artie is Level 2 with 1/1 HP, 100% Crit Rate, 50 Evasion, and 100% Aggro (Critical Density).
Artie possesses the Pattern Recognition (Rank G) skill.

last_scene: Artie faced a Skeleton Archer in the Low-Level Crypts, testing the Cloak of the Cowardly Lion's evasion capabilities.
Through a combination of automated evasion procs and his own Pattern Recognition skill, he dodged a series of lethal arrows.
The encounter concluded with the archer running out of ammunition, leaving Artie unharmed and increasingly confident in his tactical exploits.
